interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: INOAR PROFESSIONAL - Argan Oil - Promotes Hair Control, Prevents and Repairs Split Ends, and Protects Hair From the Effects of Heat Styling Tools (2 Ounces / 60 Milliliters)
Review Date: 2018/09/21
Store: Inoar
Average Rating: 4.7
Product Details: {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '1.57 x 1.57 x 4.53 inches; 3.52 Ounces', 'Item model number': '7898581080503', 'Manufacturer': 'Inoar'}
Review Text: OMG! This stuff is AMAZING! The bottle was smaller than I expected but it is VERY thick oil so a little drop goes a very long way and it smells so so good. I put a little in after I straighten my hair so my hair is always moisturized
Review Title: Soooooo worth it!!!!😍😍
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
14 in 1 Combo Set Professional White Clear Pink Powder DIY Acryic Nail Art Decorations Kit Brush Cuticle Revitalizer Oil Pen Tools Rhinestones Sanding Buffer Forms Nail Tips Glue Set
RY
{'Material': 'Acrylic', 'Brand': 'RY', 'Item Form': 'Powder'}
First off, I could smell the acrylic the second I opened it. The powders had powder on the outside of the jars, the brush is the size of a Qtip and hard like it was used. The worst part that pist me off so bad, the glue was half gone and a solid chunk. I doubt I will get new glue from them so I'm screwed. (Stores were closed by the time I realized it). Other than ALL that I guess it's ok. Wish I would have gotten a better one for couple dollars more!
So irritating!!!
eBoot 100 Pack of U Shaped Hair Pins Bun Hair Pins with Box and Storage Bag, Golden (6 cm/ 2.36 Inches)
EBOOT
{'Brand': 'EBOOT', 'Hair Type': 'All', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Material': 'Metal', 'Unit Count': '100 Count', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '2.36 x 0.04 x 0.35 inches; 3.36 Ounces', 'UPC': '712971921153'}
At first I thought they were amazing but then I realized they kept slipping out of my hair because the second I would put them in my hair they would loose their bend and double the opening. Will be returning!!!
Not amazing like I hoped 😔
INOAR PROFESSIONAL - Argan Oil - Promotes Hair Control, Prevents and Repairs Split Ends, and Protects Hair From the Effects of Heat Styling Tools (2 Ounces / 60 Milliliters)
Inoar
{'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '1.57 x 1.57 x 4.53 inches; 3.52 Ounces', 'Item model number': '7898581080503', 'Manufacturer': 'Inoar'}
OMG! This stuff is AMAZING! The bottle was smaller than I expected but it is VERY thick oil so a little drop goes a very long way and it smells so so good. I put a little in after I straighten my hair so my hair is always moisturized
Soooooo worth it!!!!😍😍
profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Product Focus**: Primarily interested in beauty and personal care, with a strong emphasis on nail art and acrylic supplies, as well as a growing interest in hair care and accessories.
- **Quality Expectations**: Maintains high standards for product quality and performance. Although the user has experienced frustrations with past purchases, recent interactions reflect satisfaction, particularly with effective and pleasant-smelling hair care products.
- **Frustration Tolerance**: Generally has low tolerance for product defects, evidenced by previous experiences with hair accessories that did not function as intended. However, recent positive experiences may indicate an openness to products that meet or exceed expectations.
- **Value Sensitivity**: Remains sensitive to perceived value, showing a willingness to invest in higher-quality items. Satisfaction with a recent hair product suggests that value can be achieved when quality is matched.
- **Material Preferences**: Previously expressed concerns about strong chemical odors in acrylic materials, but recent hair care exploration highlights a broader acceptance of diverse formulations that deliver desired results.
- **Review Patterns**: Actively engages with product reviews, balancing detailed negative feedback with positive experiences. Recent interactions reflect a trend of reinforcing expectations for quality while also celebrating products that deliver exceptional results.

This updated profile illustrates the user's evolving preferences and behaviors, particularly their response to quality and satisfaction across different beauty categories.
